text: @JUSTHEREFORAGO2 @matt27996485 @Ali_Vetnar @KTAR923 @PhxPDChief @PhoenixPolice @CityofPhoenixAZ @broomheadKTAR @GaydosAndChad We would love for everything to be open, so we can all go to a Cardinals game or go out to lunch! But again, masks won’t STOP the virus, just SLOW it. People still need to be vigilant and wear masks and social distance from others.
